title: Full Time Virtual Marketing Adminstrator
job_overview:
Please read the full description and follow the instructions at the bottom to apply.

Are you detail-oriented and exceptionally organised?

Do you love following systems and ticking off checklists?

Do you enjoy supporting a marketing team to execute campaigns and content on time and without errors?

And do you thrive in a fast-paced, remote working environment?

If you answered yes to all 4 questions… keep reading.

If you are self-motivated, disciplined, and love contributing to a high-performing team… then this is the opportunity for you!

Here’s what’s in it for you:

- $900 USD/month (independent contractor)
- Medical insurance after 6 months
- 13th Month Bonus Pay
- 15 days paid leave per year (accrued)
- 5 days paid sick leave per year (accrued)
- Work from home – forever
- Detailed onboarding and training
- Join a culture-first team, certified by Great Place To Work
- Recognition, rewards, and a remote team that’s got your back
- No guesswork – every process is documented so you can hit the ground running

A little about APB:
The Association of Professional Builders (APB) is a business coaching company for custom home builders. We provide on-demand training and systems through our membership, and we offer one-on-one coaching for builders worldwide.

Our members are thriving, and we’re growing fast but sustainably. With a remote team of 30 people across four countries, we’re committed to building a workplace we’re proud of—and we’re officially Great Place To Work Certified.

We protect our team culture and only hire people who live and breathe our values.

Our Core Values:
- We never make assumptions—we ask more questions.
- We always do the right thing, even when no one else is looking.
- We celebrate the wins.
- We don’t take things personally.
- We make decisions and own the result.
- We are impeccable with our word.
- We trust but verify.

(Hint: We might ask you about these during the interview!)

How To Apply
Step 1:
Record a video (under 3 minutes) answering:
“What excites you most about working in a marketing support role at a fully remote company?”
Make sure we can clearly see and hear you.

Step 2:
Submit your application via OnlineJobs.ph. Make sure you include:
Your resume
A cover letter tailored to this role
A link to your video from Step 1 

Step 3:
Research APB to prepare for your first interview!
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
